history.heading: Equipment, not specified by 3B001.c.1.c, designed or modified for anisotropic dry etching, having all of the following:
history.title: Equipment, not specified by 3B001.c.1.c, designed or modified for anisotropic dry etching, having all of the following:

supplement.heading: Supplement No. 1 to Part 774—The Commerce Control List

breadcrumbs: 3B993 Specified semiconductor manufacturing equipment as follows (see list of items controls).
history.text:
Equipment, not specified by 3B001.c.1.c, designed or modified for anisotropic dry etching, having all of the following:
Radio Frequency (RF) power source(s) with at least one pulsed RF output;
c.3.a. Radio Frequency (RF) power source(s) with at least one pulsed RF output;
One or more fast gas switching valve(s) with switching time less than 500 milliseconds; and
c.3.b. One or more fast gas switching valve(s) with switching time less than 500 milliseconds; and
Electrostatic chuck with greater than or equal to 10 individually controllable variable temperature elements.
c.3.c. Electrostatic chuck with greater than or equal to 10 individually controllable variable temperature elements.
